system.description: You change all metal objects within the area to wood. Weapons, armor, and metal objects carried by creatures are affected. A magic metal object has spell resistance 20 + caster level. Artifacts cannot be transmuted. Converted weapons take -2 on attack and damage; converted armor loses 2 from armor bonus. Weapons changed by this spell splinter on natural attack roll 1 or 2; armor loses an additional point of armor bonus each time struck with natural attack 19 or 20. Only limited wish, miracle, wish, or similar magic can restore a transmuted object.
